remarks: The difference between a point and it's periodic image in the interval, is decreasing.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem7.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem7.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem7.altb $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
fourierdlem7.t $e |- T = ( B - A ) $.
fourierdlem7.e $e |- E = ( x e. RR |-> ( x + ( ( |_ ` ( ( B - x ) / T ) ) x. T ) ) ) $.
fourierdlem7.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem7.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem7.xlty $e |- ( ph -> X <_ Y ) $.
fourierdlem7 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( E ` Y ) - Y ) <_ ( ( E ` X ) - X ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d T x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
$d ph x $.
